===MYSQL INSTALL(ARCHLINUX)===

1.Programm installation<br>
  sudo pacman -S mysql(or yaourt mysql)<br>

2.Program configuration<br>
  2.1 run in console <br>
    sudo /etc/rc.d/mysqld start && mysql_secure_installation<br>
  2.2 Enter current password for root (enter for none): - <Enter><br>
    Remove anonymous users? [Y/n] - нажимем Y или enter<br>
  2.3 New password: - вводим новый пароль нажимаем enter<br>
    re-enter new password: повторяем введенный пароль и enter<br>
    Remove anonymous users? [Y/n] Y<br>
  2.4 Disallow root login remotely? [Y/n] Y<br>
    Remove test database and access to it? [Y/n] Y<br>
  2.5 Reload privilege tables now? [Y/n] Y<br>
  2.6 restart mysql
    /etc/rc.d/mysqld restart

3.Product configuration<br>

4. Program run<br>
  4.1 Подключение<br>
    # mysql -u root -p<br>
    Enter password:<пароль><br>
  4.2 перезагрузка<br>
    /etc/rc.d/mysqld restart<br>
